description:
The Fast Track to Trading Strategies covers a set of proprietary trading strategies and techniques to trade the stock/equities markets. This course covers the introduction into the world of intraday trading. You'll dive into five trade sequences to put you in the mindset of a trader that executes trades - seamlessly shifting between set ups. The topics that are covered include price action, the four stages of trader evolution, concepts of correlation and a brief introduction into rifle charts. Includes a free one-on-one coaching session courtesy of the Alpha 7 Trading Academy.

Part 1:

    -Introduction

    -Literal versus Lateral Thinking

    -The 4 Stages of Trader Evolution

    -Correlation

    -Spotting Convergence and Divergence

Part 2:

    -The Iceberg Analogy

    -Rifle Charts

    -Identifying 4 Parts of Trend

    -Setting Up Basic Rifle Charts

    -Trade Sequence

    -5 Trade Sequence Examples

Part 3:

    -UA Trade Sequence

    -What is Seasoning?

    -Specialized Training

    -Exclusive Alpha 7 Trader Training Program
title: FastTrack to Stock Trading Strategies
